speaker: President. −
english:
President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0519/2007 ) by Ilda Figueiredo, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on the role of women in industry ( 2007/2197(INI) ).
This report is very important and is likely to receive a great deal of media attention.
original:
President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0519/2007 ) by Ilda Figueiredo, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on the role of women in industry ( 2007/2197(INI) ).
This report is very important and is likely to receive a great deal of media attention.
agenda_item: The role of women in industry (debate)
